abstract: By buying majority control of Sprint Nextel, SoftBank is making an enormous bet that it can turn around a flailing company beset by larger rivals. It is not the first time the Japanese company and its chief executive, Masayoshi Son, have taken on a daunting gamble.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: A Corporate Boss With a Taste for Risk Makes His Latest Big Bet
